title.en: Methods of Writing Scientific Publications in Medical Biochemistry

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: This course is created for postgraduate students who’s thesis is based on Medical Biochemistry. This course deals with both writing and final preparation of a special scientific article concerning thesis-related specific topic.

objectives.en: Primary aim of this course is to analyze technical and scientific aspects of writing, preparing and publishing of scientific paper.
objectives.et: Teadusartikli kirjutamise, vormistamise ja avaldamise tehniliste ja teaduslike aspektide analüüs.

learning_outcomes.en: The postgraduate  student should mastered knowledge concerning technically and scientifically correct preparation of completed scientific article. Is able to write a scientific article.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse läbinud doktorant on omandanud teadmised teadusartikli tehniliselt ja teaduslikult korrektse vormistamise kohta. Oskab artiklit vormistada.

description.et: Doktorant esitab Power Pointi ettekande, milles annab ülevaate valminud artiklist.  Ettekannet hinnatakse positiivseks/edukaks (arvestatud) või mittearvestatud.

grade_preconditions.et: Doktorandil on valminud artikli käsikiri ja Power Pointi ettekanne.

grade_evaluation.et: The students have to present a final manuscript of the article.

debt_elimination.et: Kui doktorandi Power Pointi ettekanne ei osutu edukaks, antakse täpne aeg esiletoodud puuduste likvideerimiseks. Juhendajad annavad täiendavaid konsultatsioone.

resources.recommended_materials: 1.	Special study materials (scientific articles, including articles of the Department of Biochemistry) are available for all registered students (PubMed andmebaas).

description.et: Scientific articles in the field of Medical Biochemistry. 	Analysis of the strong and weak points of different articles. Principal rules and demands regarding writing and final completing of a good scientific article in the field of Medical Biochemistry (20 h).
5.-14.n. 2 S n-s. Konkreetne ajakava lepitakse juhendajaga kokku lähtuvalt töö temaatikast ja doktorandi kliinilise töö iseloomust.
